As you continue to take in the room you become aware of the need to relive yourself. Your already messy and Kim will be back to change you anyway so you release your bladder into your diaper without much thought.

Your just finishing peeing, thumb in your mouth as you absent mindedly suck on it when you notice someone else in the room.

You blush when you realize your sister has just witnessed you wetting yourself with your diaper in plain view. There was no way she missed it with your skirt off and diaper pointed in her direction.

“Owivia” you start a lisp clear as you try to talk around your thumb. You pull it out and begin to try again but Olivia cuts you off.

“Aww how cute the little baby is talking.” Olivia coos as though your a baby. It wasn’t like when Kim did it, soothing and nice. Olivia’s voice was mocking. “Did the widdle baby use her diapy?” You squirm and flush embarrassed. “Does the little baby need a change?”

You don’t think you could get any redder. “I’m not a baby.” You say but there’s no confidence in it and Olivia knows it.

“Your not?” Olivia says in fake surprise. “Well then why are you on a changeing table meant for babies?”

You know its a trap. There’s no answer you can give that won’t make you sound like a baby but you can’t help but blurt out. “Cause I need my diaper changed.”

“Oh!” Olivia says grinning now. “And why would you need your diaper changed?”

You don’t want to answer you want to hit yourself for answering the first question.

“Well?” Olivia prompts again when you don’t answer.

“Cause I had an accident.” You mumble.

“What?” Olivia asks. “I didn’t hear you.” Louder you repeat your answer. “That’s right.” She confirms. “But you didn’t have an accident in your pants. No you had an accident in your diapy. Didn’t you?” Meekly you nod. “And why are you in a diaper?”

“Cause I cant make it to the bathroom.” You answer ashamed.

“No, baby Emily can’t make it to the potty like a big girl.” Olivia corrected. “She needs hers diapies doesn’t she? Otherwise hers make a big mess in hers panties doesn’t she?”

You want to stick your thumb back in your mouth as tears prick your eyes.

“Say it baby Emily.” Olivia smirks as she gets closer. “Admit you need your diapies.” You shake your head. “Admit it or I’ll tell all my friends about how my big teenage sister is just a big baby.”

“I need my diapers.” You whimper softly.

Your sister shakes her head. “That’s not what I want.”

With a pit in her gut you knew exactly what your sister wanted to hear. You sigh before you whisper. “I need diapies.”

Olivia grinned happily but before she could say anything else Kim came into the room with changing supplies. As Kim prepared to change your diaper Olivia slipped from the room.

“It’s a good thing I had to get your diapers it would have been a shame if you had wet again right after I changed you.” Kim cooed. Unaware she was driving home the same message Olivia had been taunting you about. About how you couldn’t keep yourself dry.

When Kim finished changing you into a nice dry and clean diaper:
112111121212221112122232213133123222232.title: Stay put don’t get in trouble

1121111212122211121222322131331232222321.content:
She pulled you up into a sitting position before heading over to one of the dressers in the room. You take a look down at the diaper your wearing feeling more like a toddler failing potty training then a teenager in high school despite the fact that that’s what you had been just yesterday.

This diaper felt thicker than the last one and it was harder to put your legs together though you still could if you tried. It still had Sesame Street on the front of it and it crinkled with every movement as though announcing to the world its presence. You had a feeling that the slight waddle you had earlier would be nothing compared to now when you were finally allowed to get down.

“Let’s get you into some comfy jammies.” Kim cooed coming back over with something in her hands which you assumed were pjs. She took the bottom of your shirt and lifted it above your head before you could try yourself. There you sat in front of your teacher in nothing but a diaper. A diaper she had changed you into.

Before you could put too much thought into that Kim was changing you into some kind of pjs. They were extremely soft on your skin was the first thing you realized. The second thing you realized was that they were footie pjs.

You wanted to protest being put in a onesie but you were already zipped up and placed on your feet on the floor before anything made it out of your mouth.

“Don’t you look adorable!” Kim gushed. You felt yourself grow warm at the praise. You supposed it wouldn’t be awful to wear the footed onesie it was really nice on your skin after all and it made you feel nice and warm too.

“Thank you.” You replied bashfully.

You caught a glimpse of yourself in the mirror on the door. The onesie wasn’t the same one as your nightmare instead this one was pink with baby letter blocks all over it. The bulge around your waist made it clear to anyone looking at you that you were wearing a diaper. If you didn’t know any better looking at the image in the mirror you’d assume that the image belonged to a slightly bigger than average toddler.

You shifted uncomfortably making your diaper crinkle. How did the onesie even fit you. There was no way you were small enough to fit into baby clothes yet the onesie fit you rather well.

“What would you like to do now?” Kim asked. “Do you want to play with some toys or do you want to color or maybe watch a movie while I make dinner?”
1121111212122211121222322131331232222321.title: She decided to change your clothes

1121111212122211121222322131331232222321.content:
“Watch a movie.” You decide. You don’t want to think about diapers or your sister or even your outfit anymore. You just wanted to relax after the stress of the day.

“Alright.” Kim agreed. She took your hand in hers and led you down to the living room once more.

You were right about the diaper. It crinkled with every movement and you found yourself developing a baby’s waddle. When it came to the steps the diaper threw you off and you ended up falling on your bottom. After a second failed attempt in which you fell forward and were caught by Kim she picked you up and carried you down the steps.

“I think it’s a little too dangerous for you to go down the stairs hunny.” Kim said kindly. After the scare of nearly falling down them you quickly nodded your agreement. You did not want to try that again.

Finally making it into the living room Kim showed you various Disney movies and asked which one you wanted to watch. She sets you up quickly and you settle yourself on the couch.

Next thing you know your thumb is in your mouth again and the end credits are rolling. You wiggle on the couch your diaper crinkling once more you decide you want another movie. Sliding off the couch you toddle in the direction you think is the kitchen diaper crinkling with every step.

You don’t have to travel too far. Kim is in the kitchen but she stops what she’s doing when she hears your diaper and looks over at you. You blush when you realize your thumb is still in your mouth and think you really must look like a baby looking for mommy.

“Is the movie over baby?” Kim asks crouching down so she’s eyes level. You nod. Between the crying earlier and the movie you just watched your surprised you didn’t fall asleep again. “Well dinner is just about ready so why don’t we wash our hands and sit at the table alright?” You nod but as Kim starts to stand back up you reach for her with grabby hands.

“Up.” You say around your thumb. She smiles and lift you into her arms.

“Better?” She asks tickling your tummy and you can’t help but giggle and nod.

You’ve been carried a lot today you realize and it makes you feel safe and warm. You wonder if your mom would do that when she gets back from her trip but you don’t think about it too much. You don’t know how your moms going to react to finding out your in diapers and you don’t have to worry about it for a while yet.

Kim helps you wash your hands though you think you could have probably done it yourself you don’t say anything. Of all the things Kim’s done today for you washing your hands is probably the least babyish.

Then she carries you over to your dinner chair.

You actually manage to whine when you realize she is going to strap you into a highchair like a baby. But she simply hushes you and has the tray clicked on before you can offer up any real resistance.

You try to wiggle free but you can’t reach the straps with the tray on and you can’t get leverage on the tabs for the tray from your current position. Your so busy trying to get free that you don’t notice Olivia has entered the room.

“Your going to hurt yourself baby Emily.” Olivia says walking over and pushing you down into the seat.

“I don’t want to be in a highchair.” You pout.

“If you don’t eat in a highchair you might get hurt.” this time it’s said with a genuine smile. She may want you to be humiliated and treated like a baby but she doesn’t want you hurt and if you continue squirming you might just make the highchair fall over and get hurt.

Slowly you stop fighting the straps but don’t stop pouting. “I won’t get hurt if I eat in a regular chair.” You insist.

“Babies eat in highchairs.” Olivia said firmly.

You want to argue that you aren’t a baby but your current outfit and most of your actions today haven’t been that of a teenager. You cross your arms and refuse to give up even if you don’t answer. Olivia sighs and then smirks. You tense wondering what she’s going to do. Then all of a sudden she’s tickling you everywhere she can reach and you can’t help but laugh in response.

You feel your bladder give way and your vaguely glad your wearing a diaper because you don’t have to worry about pee getting everywhere and stopping the fun that your having before you come to your senses and realize your supposed to be upset about being in a highchair.

“Sounds like a happy baby.” Kim coos as she comes out with three plates of food and places one in front of you.

The door to your lab opened a heartbeat later and Kate came running down to find you standing in the middle of your lab, tears flowing freely. "Kate, I had an accident... in more ways than one!" crying, you said.

"Nick!?" looking at you, Kate screamed. "What happened to you!?"

You tearfully explained what you were working on and what had happened. "Until I can get the antidote made, I'm stuck as a two foot man with the appearance of an infant." finishing your explanation. "Kate, please, you have to help me make the antidote, I can tell you what must be done."

For a moment, Kate just stares at you with a bemused look on her face. To your horror, that look turns into a shark like grin as she said, "You spend way too much time in this lab... young man. I think you need a break from this."

"What!?!" shocked, you asked. "Kate, this is not a game! Help me make the antidote!"

Kate shook her head. "I don't think so, not for a while." smiling, she said. "I'm thinking..."
1233.title: Nick

12331.content: "I have a baby boy!" she picks you up and says to you "you did have an accident in more ways than one. In fact its ways one and two. Let's get you changed into a diaper incase you have another accident." she carries you away and puts you in the ladies bathroom. "Mummy's going to diaper her wittle baby" she says in a babyish voice. She then diapers you and holds your hand and shows you around. When
12331.title: I have a new baby boy.

123312.content:
Panicked, you squirm free from Katie's grasp and land hard onto your diapered bum on the tiled floor. The impact hurt worse than you thought but the idea of your wife treating you as a baby moved you to your feet and you began to run, well... waddle away as fast as your new body could carry you. Katie giggled, amused by your escape attempt. "There's nothing to be afraid of, sweetie." smiling, she said. "Just humor me for a few days and I'll help you make the antidote."

"If I don't get that paper done, including the antidote, we lose the government contract." trying to avoid your now giantess wife. "Is a multimillion dollar contract really worth a little 'fun' with your husband?"

Katie thought about it for a moment then sighed. "I'll help you make the antidote." finally catching you, she said. "However, that does not mean you will get it for yourself anytime soon." she giggled. "Come on, think about it. You get to rest all day while I do all the work for a change."

What do you say?
123312.title: You try run away

choices: I will let a responsible Babysitter take good care of you."
I will just give you into day nursery.
1233121.content:
You know that you don't have a choice so you agree to the deal, and tell Katie everything she needs to know to make the antidote and then you ask her. "Well how do you plan to look after me while you are working on the antidote?"

Katie replies with "
1233121.title: okay.

choices: Stay in the nursery and wait for Kate
Sneak out and hide in the mysterious building with little girls clothing
12331212.content: Within the next hour you are shoved into some overalls and a diaper with Sesame street characters on it. Kate drops you at the day nursery and you decide to hang around as the day progresses. After an hour you feel your hair hit your shoulder and to your shock your hair has grown tremendously. You look quickly over at a mirror and see you now resemble a 6 year old girl. Your diaper and overalls no longer fit and these side effects seem to not let up. You look through the window and see the back of building. The back door opens as a woman goes in and see that the building contains girls clothing. You might be able to run away and blend in until you can make the anecdote.
12331212.title: I will just give you into day nursery.

choices: she treated you as if you were always a girl
she seemed surprised that you were a girl now.
123312121.content:
You were scared. You honestly didn't know what to do. You were for some reason a little girl now. You didn't know if you should stay in the nursery or run away.

Then you reasoned to yourself to stay. You decided it was probably safer that way. You weren't sure why you were a girl now, but at least at the nursery people will be there to take care of you.

From the feel of your diaper, you could tell you were going to need a change soon. You looked around and there was a teenage girl near you.

She appeared to be tall. She especially appeared tall, to your now shrunken self. She was fairly pretty too. At least your boy self would have thought so.

She had shoulder length, straight, red hair. She had gray eyes. She had large D-cup boobs.

She was wearing a black button up shirt. She had on khaki pants. She knelt down in front of you.

"Hello there, little one!! My name is Kelly. Do you want to play with me until your mommy gets back?" she asked in a soft voice.

You nodded shyly. During the day, you spent the day with Kelly. She played with you, which seemed to be fun. She made sure you had clean diapers on. She also made sure you had food in your belly.

You especially liked "calm" time. She had you sit on her lap. She would rub your back. She would rest your head against her chest.

The rest of the day went quickly. You waited for Kate to return and get you. When she did return it was much later.

When Kate saw you,...
123312121.title: Stay in the nursery and wait for Kate

info.brief_description: People of all ages have accidents and may end up in diapers/pull-ups
info.description:
The rules are:
No drugs, No sex, No killing characters, No regression, no growth or shrinking in the girls stories.
If possible always leave an extra option where the character makes it to the bathroom incase somebody else wants to add a different embarrassment. For example with Emily there is an option of making it to the toilet incase somebody else wants Emily to be embarrassed later. Please stick with these rules but other than that have fun!
